quote_last: in the evening, June 18, 1941–everything was different.
title: Everything is Illuminated
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote_first: The call had been made at
quote_last: . This was one more piece of evidence, and an important one. It proved what they had suspected from the first: that the killer was in St. Anselm’s.
title: Death in Holy Orders
author: P.D. James
